headline: Ask HN: Why don’t work chat apps have min character post requirement?
description:
My company uses Slack. The amount of noise in channels is extreme due to the low friction that Slack allows for one word channel responses, or people posting just an emoji or gif.

It seems like a huge amount of noise could be eliminated if Slack (or other work chat apps) required a minimum amount of characters for a channel post.

Does anyone know of a work chat app that allows for this requirement?

(For 1:1 chat, I can see not having this restriction. But having say, 100 character minimum post requirement for all channel posts seems like it would force really good chat edict - as well help reduce the “Slack stress” we’ve all come to experience)
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么工作聊天软件没有最小字符的帖子要求？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼工作聊天軟件沒有最小字符的帖子要求？
description_zh-Hans:
我的公司使用Slack。

如果Slack（或其他工作聊天应用程序）要求频道帖子的最低字符数，似乎可以消除大量的噪音。

有人知道有什么工作聊天应用程序允许这种要求吗？但是，如果对所有频道的帖子都有100个字符的最低要求，这似乎会迫使我们制定非常好的聊天规则--同时也有助于减少我们所经历的 "Slack压力")
